message.content: Most men in Chile hold conservative views on abortion, opposing its legalization. They believe that abortion is morally wrong and goes against their religious or cultural beliefs. They often prioritize the protection of the unborn child's life and advocate for alternatives such as adoption or providing support to pregnant women. However, it is important to note that opinions on abortion can vary among individuals, and there may be some men in Chile who support the decriminalization or legalization of abortion under certain circumstances.
